verses.html:
1
Glory to His Name,
The Almighty God!
Glory to our Lord,
Praise His Name!
Hallelujah, Hallelujah!
Glory to Jesus,
Praise His Name!

2
Glory to our God,
He will never change.
Glory to our Lord,
Praise His Name!
Hallelujah, Hallelujah!
Glory to Jesus,
Praise His Name!

3
Glory be to God!
Jesus comes again,
Glory to our Lord,
Praise His Name!
Hallelujah, Hallelujah!
Glory to Jesus,
Praise His Name!
